examples.example: 我拿着车票，怀着兴奋的心情踏上了愉快的旅途。

translate.english: I held the train ticket and set out on a pleasant journey with an excited mood.

examples.example: 我买好了车票，准备开启一段精彩的旅程。

translate.english: I have bought the train ticket and am ready to start an exciting journey.

examples.example: 我提前买好了车票，期待着这场充满惊喜的出行。

translate.english: I bought the ticket in advance and am looking forward to this trip full of surprises.
